forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.
